Sentencas: The crystallization processes that occur in alkaline earth silicate glasses designed for sealing solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) have been investigated using differential thermal analysis (DTA) and hot-stage microscopy (HSM).
Titulo: Crystallization and processing of SOFC sealing glasses

Sentencas: HSM experiments revealed that glass powders with particle sizes <45 mu m crystallized before viscous sintering was complete.
Titulo: Crystallization and processing of SOFC sealing glasses

Sentencas: This behavior is consistent with the effects of glass particle size on the characteristic temperatures measured by DTA.
Titulo: Crystallization and processing of SOFC sealing glasses

Sentencas: The importance and role of the specific crystallization process on the effectiveness of glasses for SOFC sealing applications are discussed.
Titulo: Crystallization and processing of SOFC sealing glasses
